metadata.Title: CVE-2021-40978 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** The mkdocs 1.2.2 built-in dev-server allows directorytraversal using the port 8000, enabling remote exploitation to obtain:sensitive information. NOTE: the vendor has disputed this as described inhttps://github.com/mkdocs/mkdocs/issues/2601.] andhttps://github.com/nisdn/CVE-2021-40978/issues/1.

criterions.comment: python-mkdocs package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
